name: Idle School 3d - Tycoon Game
description:
Can you build the best school? New fun and addictive idle game. Open new classrooms to teach your students. Upgrade your classes to fit more students and give more knowledge to your future graduates. Earn money and grow your business!

Now you are the manager of this school. It is up for you to decide which classrooms to open and how to run your School Empire.

Main features:
Upgrade school bus seats and frequency;
Buy new classrooms;
Upgrade current classes;
Achieve goals to get free gems;
Spend gems for significant upgrades;
Use extra bonuses;
Buy School Manager to get the fastest earnings;
And much much more!

Try our new Idle School Tycoon game and have fun! Be sure to contact us if you have any questions or suggestions (:
